tracks.title: Systems & Reliability Engineer
tracks.summary: Design scalable Python systems, focusing on boundaries, resilience, observability, and internal tooling.

quests.title: Service Boundaries & Contracts
quests.short_description: Refactor a monolith into clean layers with defined contracts.
quests.long_description: Design clean module/service boundaries. Practice hexagonal architecture, DTOs vs ORM models, and dependency injection.
objectives: Identify and isolate core domain logic from adapters.
Define clear interfaces/contracts for module interaction.

quests.title: Resilient Job Runner
quests.short_description: Build a background worker with retries and graceful shutdowns.
quests.long_description: Build a production-ready job runner. Implement idempotency, retries with backoff/DLQ, and graceful shutdown handling.
objectives: Implement a job processing loop with signal handling.
Add exponential backoff and dead-letter queue logic.
Ensure job idempotency via unique keys.

quests.title: Observability & SLIs
quests.short_description: Instrument a service with metrics, logs, and traces.
quests.long_description: Add observability to a python service. Define SLIs, implement structured logging, and propagate trace contexts.
objectives: Define and measure SLIs for latency and error rate.
Implement structured logging with correlation IDs.

quests.title: Performance & Profiling
quests.short_description: Diagnose bottlenecks using profilers and benchmarks.
quests.long_description: Profile a slow endpoint/script. Use profiling tools to find bottlenecks and optimize via algos, async, or caching.
objectives: Generate flame graphs to identify hotspots.
Benchmark code before and after optimization.
Document trade-offs of the chosen optimization.

quests.title: Internal Tooling & DX
quests.short_description: Build a CLI or SDK to improve developer efficiency.
quests.long_description: Create an internal tool. Focus on CLI ergonomics, packaging, versioning, and documentation.
objectives: Build a CLI with intuitive command structure (e.g. Typer).
Package the tool for easy distribution.
Write usage documentation and a changelog.

bosses.title: Foundry Systems Architect
bosses.description: Design a modernization runbook for a legacy Python monolith.
objectives: Design an observability and SLO strategy.
Plan safe concurrency and async adoption.
Create a phased rollout and rollback plan.

tracks.title: Frontier Frontend & DX Lead
tracks.summary: Master frontend architecture, performance, design systems, and developer experience.

quests.title: Frontend Architecture & State
quests.long_description: Design a scalable TS React architecture. Define state management layers, module boundaries, and feature flag strategies.
objectives: Define global vs local state boundaries.
Architect module federation or lazy loading.
Implement a feature flag provider pattern.

quests.title: Web Performance & Budgets
quests.long_description: Diagnose bundle bloat and slow TTI. Implement code-splitting, memoization, and establish performance budgets.
objectives: Analyze bundle size and implement splitting.

quests.title: Design System Steward
quests.long_description: Integrate a design system. Create typed design tokens, reusable primitives, and enforce usage via types.

quests.title: Typed API & Errors
quests.long_description: Build a typed API client. proper schema validation (Zod), structured error handling, and retry policies.
objectives: Generate or define types from API schema.

quests.title: DX & Testing Pipeline
quests.long_description: Set up a complete DX pipeline. Configure eslint/prettier, strict type-checking, E2E tests, and preview environments.

bosses.title: Prism Frontier Architect
bosses.description: Blueprint the migration of a large JS SPA to a modular, typed TS ecosystem.
objectives: Integrate design system and DX tools.

tracks.title: Platform & Services Engineer
tracks.summary: Engineer resilient Java platforms, handling consistency, observability, and upgrades.

quests.title: Bounded Contexts
quests.long_description: Define and enforce bounded contexts within a service mesh architecture.

quests.title: Resilient APIs
quests.long_description: Design resilient APIs using timeouts, circuit breakers, and bulkheads.

quests.title: Data Consistency
quests.long_description: Reason about consistency. Handle distributed transactions versus eventual consistency using messaging patterns.

quests.title: Distributed Observability
quests.long_description: Implement full tracing and metrics for multi-service interactions.

quests.title: Zero-Downtime Upgrade
quests.long_description: Plan a rolling upgrade for JDK or framework version with zero downtime.

bosses.title: Reactor Platform Guardian
bosses.description: Orchestrate a critical service migration with breaking changes and infra upgrades.

tracks.title: Analytics Lead & Governance
tracks.summary: Lead data governance, modeling, and warehouse optimization.

quests.title: Metrics Contracts
quests.long_description: Define canonical metrics and data contracts across teams.

quests.title: Warehouse Modeling
quests.long_description: Design fact/dimension models for a new product surface.

quests.title: Cost & Performance
quests.long_description: Optimize warehouse costs via partitioning, clustering, and storage tiers.

quests.title: Quality Monitoring
quests.long_description: Implement data quality checks and incident procedures for schema drift or missing data.
objectives: Deploy automated DQ checks (e.g., dbt test).

quests.title: Self-Service Analytics
quests.long_description: Design self-serve patterns including views, dashboards, and documentation.

bosses.title: Governance Warden
bosses.description: Establish governance and resolve incidents for a failing warehouse.

tracks.title: SRE & Incident Commander
tracks.summary: Master SRE practices, incident command, and infrastructure scaling.

quests.title: SLIs & SLOs
quests.long_description: Define SLI/SLOs for a multi-service product and calculate error budgets.

quests.title: Incident Drills
quests.long_description: Design incident runbooks and Game Day scenarios with failure injection.

quests.title: Capacity Planning
quests.long_description: Perform capacity planning and design scaling plans for future growth.

quests.title: Multi-Region Design
quests.long_description: Outline multi-region / multi-AZ design and failover strategies.

quests.title: Security Baseline
quests.long_description: Set pragmatic security baselines: secrets management, RBAC, and network perimeters.

bosses.title: Incident Commander
bosses.description: Lead the response to a complex multi-region outage.

tracks.title: Orchestrator & Policy Engineer
tracks.summary: Build robust, orchestrated multi-agent systems with safety and evaluation.

quests.title: Task Decomposition
quests.long_description: Design a robust strategy for decomposing complex user goals into agent tasks.

quests.title: Tool Contracts
quests.long_description: Define typed tool contracts, error channels, and fallback mechanisms for reliability.

quests.title: Agent Evals
quests.long_description: Design an evaluation harness for agents including metrics and regression tests.
objectives: Build a dataset of golden runs.

quests.title: Safety Guardrails
quests.long_description: Implement policy and safety rails, including allow/deny lists and budget controls.

quests.title: Agent Observability
quests.long_description: Instrument agent runs with traces, spans, cost tracking, and latency metrics.

bosses.title: Orchestrator Warden
bosses.description: Architect a resilient multi-agent orchestration system from a brittle PoC.

tracks.title: Release & Migration Engineer
tracks.summary: Expertise in release strategy, migrations, and complex repo management.

quests.title: Release Strategy
quests.long_description: Design release strategies (trunk, git-flow, preview environments) suitable for the team.
objectives: Compare and select a branching model.

quests.title: Long-Running Migrations
quests.long_description: Handle long-running migration branches using feature flags and backports.

quests.title: Monorepo Practices
quests.long_description: Implement best practices for monorepos including workspaces, CI sharding, and code ownership.

quests.title: Audit & Ownership
quests.long_description: Build an audit trail and robust code ownership map for a complex repository.

quests.title: Hotfix Process
quests.long_description: Define valid processes for emergency hotfixes and post-incident cleanup.
objectives: Ensure changes are synced to main.

bosses.title: Migration Guardian
bosses.description: Execute a safe, breaking schema/API migration across distributed services.

quests.title: Agent Observability
quests.long_description: Instrument agent runs with traces, spans, cost tracking, and latency metrics.

bosses.title: Orchestrator Warden
bosses.description: Architect a resilient multi-agent orchestration system from a brittle PoC.

tracks.title: Release & Migration Engineer
tracks.summary: Expertise in release strategy, migrations, and complex repo management.

quests.title: Release Strategy
quests.long_description: Design release strategies (trunk, git-flow, preview environments) suitable for the team.
objectives: Compare and select a branching model.

quests.title: Long-Running Migrations
quests.long_description: Handle long-running migration branches using feature flags and backports.

quests.title: Monorepo Practices
quests.long_description: Implement best practices for monorepos including workspaces, CI sharding, and code ownership.

quests.title: Audit & Ownership
quests.long_description: Build an audit trail and robust code ownership map for a complex repository.

quests.title: Hotfix Process
quests.long_description: Define valid processes for emergency hotfixes and post-incident cleanup.
objectives: Ensure changes are synced to main.

bosses.title: Migration Guardian
bosses.description: Execute a safe, breaking schema/API migration across distributed services.

tracks.title: ML Ops & Safety Lead
tracks.summary: Design and run an ML platform that is reliable, observable, and safe to iterate on.

quests.title: Feature Lifecycle Architect
quests.summary: Design the end-to-end lifecycle for ML features: creation, backfill, online/ offline usage, and deprecation.
quests.objective: Given a product scenario (e.g., risk scoring or recommendations), define a feature registry schema, backfill strategy, and online/ offline access patterns. Document how features are versioned, tested, and retired.

quests.title: Model CI/CD Pipeline Engineer
quests.summary: Design a CI/CD pipeline that takes models from training notebook to safe production deploys.
quests.objective: Sketch a pipeline that runs training, evaluation, regression checks, and canary deploys. Include artifact storage, promotion rules, and rollback steps.

quests.title: Drift & Performance Watcher
quests.summary: Define monitoring for performance, drift, and basic fairness of a live ML model.
quests.objective: For a given model (binary classification or ranking), specify the metrics, dashboards, and alerts you would build. Cover data drift, target drift, latency, and a minimal fairness surface.

quests.title: Model Governance Steward
quests.summary: Introduce pragmatic governance: model cards, approvals, and audit trails.
quests.objective: Create a template for model cards and an approval workflow. Show how you would track who changed what, when, and why across models and datasets.

quests.title: Champion–Challenger Strategist
quests.summary: Plan a multi-model strategy: champion/challenger, routing, and graceful retirement.
quests.objective: For a product with multiple segments and legacy models, design how you would run A/Bs, champion/challenger tests, and gradually retire old models without breaking users.

bosses.title: ML Ops Sentinel
bosses.summary: Guard of the ML platform’s reliability and safety. Tests your ability to design an end-to-end ML platform modernization plan.
